general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages...

advisory: Water deficit during critical stages should be avoided.
Cover the rows with dry leaves to protect from water scarcity.
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer.
High temperature increases water requirement, irrigate the crop.
Avoid stagnant water for more than six hours in the field.
Apply Streptocyclin in root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps to manage shoot and fruit borer.
Spray neem-based pesticide in case of pest infestation.
Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings with paper caps during the day time.
Harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30Â°C in shallow ponds.
Check the migration of caterpillars and apply appropriate insecticides.
Check the migration of caterpillars and apply appropriate insecticides.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing to prevent whitefly infestation.
Cut the tops after harvesting and dry bulbs in a ventilated room for storage.
Control mango hoppers with appropriate insecticides.
Application of smoke below the plants can help in reducing the pest population.
